fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Question the loyalty of an authorized target during the night.
- Question the loyalty of an unauthorized target during the night. 1 Use.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When questioning a target's loyalty, you will attack them if they attempt to visit an unauthorized target.
- You will not attack someone visiting themselves or visiting the Sentry (Power) with a non-negative ability.
